block lp < 80
	 EndWindow "\n\n\n\n@c你的生命值不足80"

block
	KillItem 69119,1
	setlp -80
	Play_SE 210,320,240
	Play_SE 218,320,240
	giveLeak1Item (71034%10$1,71037%10$1,71040%10$1,71043%10$1,71046%10$1,71033%20$1,71036%20$1,71039%20$1,71042%20$1,71045%20$1,71032%8$1,71035%8$1,71038%8$1,71041%8$1,71044%8$1)
endblock
